{{doomwiki}}[[Image:Foreverhoodscreen1.jpg|right|thumb|230px|A screenshot of an area in Foreverhood]] {{Wad | name = Foreverhood | author = Brian Goodsell "Skadoomer" | iwad = Stand-alone | status = Released | type = m | caco = 13 | link = [http://www.foreverhood.com/Files/Foreverhood%201.1.zip Download from official site] }} == Description == '''Foreverhood''' is an independent game developed with the [[ZDoom]] engine, created as an "experimental video project" which presents a surreal environment and a strange story.
The project had one major revision, bumping its version number to 1.1. A more sweeping update was planned, which would have resulted in Foreverhood 2.0, but the project was canceled since and 1.1 remains the last version of the game.
== Reception == ''Foreverhood'' is a true total conversion and does not use resources from Doom or any other game. It was highly praised, even receiving a [[Cacoward]], for its unique and beautiful visual style, as well as for the huge levels, complex architecture, unique characters and intriguing storyline.
